   Gallery
   =======

   Acoustics

   Diffusion
   ^^^^^^^^^
   .. list-table::
      :align: center
      :class: gallery

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-cube.png
             :target: diffusion-cube.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation (eg: temperature distribution) on a cube geometry with different boundary condition values on the cube sides <diffusion-cube>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-darcy_flow_multicomp.png
             :target: diffusion-darcy_flow_multicomp.html

             :ref:`Each of the two equations describes a flow in one compartment of a porous medium <diffusion-darcy_flow_multicomp>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-laplace_1d.png
             :target: diffusion-laplace_1d.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation in 1D with a variable coefficient <diffusion-laplace_1d>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-laplace_coupling_lcbcs.png
             :target: diffusion-laplace_coupling_lcbcs.html

             :ref:`Two Laplace equations with multiple linear combination constraints <diffusion-laplace_coupling_lcbcs>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-laplace_fluid_2d.png
             :target: diffusion-laplace_fluid_2d.html

             :ref:`A Laplace equation that models the flow of "dry water" around an obstacle shaped like a Citroen CX <diffusion-laplace_fluid_2d>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-laplace_iga_interactive.png
             :target: diffusion-laplace_iga_interactive.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation with Dirichlet boundary conditions solved in a single patch NURBS domain using the isogeometric analysis (IGA) approach, using commands for interactive use <diffusion-laplace_iga_interactive>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-laplace_refine_interactive.png
             :target: diffusion-laplace_refine_interactive.html

             :ref:`Example of solving Laplace's equation on a block domain refined with level 1 hanging nodes <diffusion-laplace_refine_interactive>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-laplace_shifted_periodic.png
             :target: diffusion-laplace_shifted_periodic.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation with shifted periodic BCs <diffusion-laplace_shifted_periodic>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-laplace_time_ebcs.png
             :target: diffusion-laplace_time_ebcs.html

             :ref:`Example explaining how to change Dirichlet boundary conditions depending on time <diffusion-laplace_time_ebcs>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation using the long syntax of keywords <diffusion-poisson>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_field_dependent_material.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_field_dependent_material.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation with a field-dependent material parameter <diffusion-poisson_field_dependent_material>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_functions.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_functions.html

             :ref:`Poisson equation with source term <diffusion-poisson_functions>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_iga.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_iga.html

             :ref:`Poisson equation solved in a single patch NURBS domain using the isogeometric analysis (IGA) approach <diffusion-poisson_iga>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_neumann.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_neumann.html

             :ref:`The Poisson equation with Neumann boundary conditions on a part of the boundary <diffusion-poisson_neumann>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_nonlinear_material.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_nonlinear_material.html

             :ref:`Nonlinear Poisson's equation example demonstrating the nonlinear diffusion and nonlinear volume force terms <diffusion-poisson_nonlinear_material>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_parallel_interactive.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_parallel_interactive.html

             :ref:`Parallel assembling and solving of a Poisson's equation, using commands for interactive use <diffusion-poisson_parallel_interactive>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_parametric_study.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_parametric_study.html

             :ref:`Poisson equation <diffusion-poisson_parametric_study>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_periodic_boundary_condition.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_periodic_boundary_condition.html

             :ref:`Transient Laplace equation with a localized power source and periodic boundary conditions <diffusion-poisson_periodic_boundary_condition>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-poisson_short_syntax.png
             :target: diffusion-poisson_short_syntax.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation using the short syntax of keywords <diffusion-poisson_short_syntax>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-sinbc_grad.png
             :target: diffusion-sinbc.html

             :ref:`Laplace equation with Dirichlet boundary conditions given by a sine function and constants <diffusion-sinbc>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-time_advection_diffusion.png
             :target: diffusion-time_advection_diffusion.html

             :ref:`The transient advection-diffusion equation with a given divergence-free advection velocity <diffusion-time_advection_diffusion>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-time_heat_equation_multi_material.png
             :target: diffusion-time_heat_equation_multi_material.html

             :ref:`Transient heat equation with time-dependent source term, three different material domains and Newton type boundary condition loss term <diffusion-time_heat_equation_multi_material>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-time_poisson.png
             :target: diffusion-time_poisson.html

             :ref:`Transient Laplace equation with non-constant initial conditions given by a function <diffusion-time_poisson>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-time_poisson_explicit.png
             :target: diffusion-time_poisson_explicit.html

             :ref:`Transient Laplace equation <diffusion-time_poisson_explicit>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/diffusion-time_poisson_interactive-time_poisson_interactive_probe_04.png
             :target: diffusion-time_poisson_interactive.html

             :ref:`Transient Laplace equation (heat equation) with non-constant initial conditions given by a function, using commands for interactive use <diffusion-time_poisson_interactive>`

   Navier Stokes
   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   .. list-table::
      :align: center
      :class: gallery

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/navier_stokes-navier_stokes.png
             :target: navier_stokes-navier_stokes.html

             :ref:`Navier-Stokes equations for incompressible fluid flow <navier_stokes-navier_stokes>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/navier_stokes-navier_stokes2d_iga.png
             :target: navier_stokes-navier_stokes2d_iga.html

             :ref:`Navier-Stokes equations for incompressible fluid flow in 2D solved in a single patch NURBS domain using the isogeometric analysis (IGA) approach <navier_stokes-navier_stokes2d_iga>`

      * - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/navier_stokes-stabilized_navier_stokes.png
             :target: navier_stokes-stabilized_navier_stokes.html

             :ref:`Stabilized Navier-Stokes problem with grad-div, SUPG and PSPG stabilization solved by a custom Oseen solver <navier_stokes-stabilized_navier_stokes>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/navier_stokes-stokes.png
             :target: navier_stokes-stokes.html

             :ref:`Stokes equations for incompressible fluid flow <navier_stokes-stokes>`

        - .. figure:: ../images/gallery/thumbnails/navier_stokes-stokes_slip_bc.png
             :target: navier_stokes-stokes_slip_bc.html

             :ref:`Incompressible Stokes flow with Navier (slip) boundary conditions, flow driven by a moving wall and a small diffusion for stabilization <navier_stokes-stokes_slip_bc>`
